name: Schoolhouse
description: A center of learning and knowledge; adventurers might consult scholars, access archives, or teach for coin.
atmosphere: The schoolhouse has a lively, educational atmosphere with the sound of children learning and the scent of chalk dust and old books. The air carries the promise of knowledge and the essential nature of education, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of youthful learning and the excitement of discovering new ideas and skills.
